info: T means true, F means False. If no publications, just leave the publication structure unchanged.
name: Richard SOKOLOSKI

publications.text: The Poetry of Mikolaj Sep Szarzynski (c.1550-1581) Ed., Wiesbaden: O. Harrassowitz, 1990.
A Search for knowledge and freedom: the Polish-Canadian perspective: proceedings of a symposium, edited by Pawel Wyczynski, Andrzej H. Ruszkowski, Richard Sokoloski, Ottawa, 1993.
Forms in relief and other works: a bilingual edition / Tadeusz Rózewicz; translated, with an introduction by Richard Sokoloski, Ottawa, 1994.

Adam Jerzy Czartoryski: letters to Vilna - Adam Jerzy Czartoryski: listy do Wilna / edited and translated, with an introduction by Richard Sokoloski; foreword, Sergej Ivanovich Nikolaev, Slavic Research Group/Russian Academy of Sciences, 1999.
Wspomnienie o Januszu Rózewiczu - Janusz Rózewicz: a reminiscence / Feliks Przylubski; edited and translated, with an introduction by Richard Sokoloski, Ottawa, 2000.
Warsztaty Translatorskie/Workshop on Translation , ed., with H. Duda, Towarzystwo Naukowe, Katolicki Universitet Lubelski/Slavic Research Group, Lublin/ 2001.

affiliation.text: Department of Modern Languages and Literatures
